column2: IDEA-158882 Adding support for setting.xml set via .mvn/maven.config

column3: Maven 3.3 provides support for supplying project-specific maven execution arguments via .mvn/maven.config under the project base directory. This patch address issue IDEA-158882 to honors the --settings or -s argument supplied in that file.
Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please check your inbox: I've just send there the CLA to sign. Thanks.
I Just faxed the CLA. Thanks.
It seems the fix is not complete, it's just an illustration of needed support. The settings.xml set via .mvn/maven.config actually is not used for the project import, am I right or I miss something?
